titles.title: HP322 O Spirit of the living God

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
O Spirit of the living God,
In all thy plenitude of grace,
Where'er the human foot has trod,
Descend on our rebellious race.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Give tongues of fire and hearts of love
To preach the reconciling word
Give thine anointing from above,
Whene'er the joyful sound is heard.

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines:
O Spirit of the Lord, prepare
The whole round world her God to meet;
Breathe thou abroad like morning air,
Till hearts of stone begin to beat.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Baptize the nations; far and nigh
The triumphs of the cross record;
The name of Jesus glorify,
Till all the earth shall call him Lord.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
God from eternity has willed
All flesh shall his salvation see;
So be the Father's love fulfilled,
The Saviour's sufferings crowned through thee.
